version_description:
• Adds ability to include/exclude the end date in the Date-to-Date calculator
• Minor bug fixes

• Improved the city search algorithm.
• 24-hour clock setting now displays 24-hour clock results.

• Expanded the date range down to the year 1800 and up to year 3999
• Includes number of weeks, and percentage of current year, in the results
• Bug fixes and improvements

Disclaimer: This version of the app supports date calculations back in time to the year 1800. Please note that some countries were still using the Julian calendar back then, while the app uses today's Gregorian calendar.

• Extends the year range from year 1 to 3999.
• Bug fixes and improvements.
• Fixes crash when sending result to calendar

• Minor modification to some UI components
• Bugfixes and improvements behind the scenes

• Added mandatory privacy policy
• Updates to internal databases
• Updated for iOS 12
• Fixed bugs in the search screen
• Fixed bug when selecting the time picker in the Date-to-Date calculator

- Change of city search filter no longer clears the search query
- Bug fixes and improvements
• Fixed colouring bug in the segmented control on the add/subtract calculator

• Fixed set Start Date bug
• Updated place database

• Fixed bug when selecting start time
• Updated place database

• Fixed bug when selecting start time
• Updated place database
